algorithm.name: AZURESPEECH
algorithm.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform speech-to-text.

properties.name: ACS_URL
properties.description: URL for the Azure Cognitive Services Endpoint. e.g. https://virginia.cris.azure.us/api/speechtotext/v2.0/transcriptions. Can also be provided by an environment variable with the same name. If both are provided, the job property is used.  Note that the component was only tested against v2.0 of the API.

properties.name: ACS_ACCOUNT_NAME
properties.description: Azure Cognitive Services account name. Can also be provided by an environment variable with the same name. If both are provided, the job property is used.

properties.name: ACS_SUBSCRIPTION_KEY
properties.description: Azure Cognitive Services subscription key. Can also be provided by an environment variable with the same name. If both are provided, the job property is used.

properties.name: ACS_SPEECH_KEY
properties.description: Azure Cognitive Services Speech key. Can also be provided by an environment variable with the same name. If both are provided, the job property is used.

properties.name: ACS_CONTAINER_NAME
properties.description: The container name to use for hosting file blobs. Can also be provided by an environment variable with the same name. If both are provided, the job property is used.

properties.name: ACS_ENDPOINT_SUFFIX
properties.description: The endpoint suffix. Can also be provided by an environment variable with the same name. If both are provided, the job property is used.

properties.name: LANGUAGE
properties.description: When provided, this disables automatic language detection. The BCP-47 language code of the text to be detected in the image. This value is case-sensitive.

properties.name: DIARIZE
properties.description: Whether to split audio into speaker turns. Supports two-speaker conversation.

properties.name: CLEANUP
properties.description: Whether to delete recording blobs and transcripts after processing.

actions.name: AZURE SPEECH DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform speech-to-text in English.

tasks.name: AZURE SPEECH DETECTION TASK
tasks.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform speech-to-text in English.

pipelines.name: AZURE SPEECH DETECTION PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform speech-to-text in English.
